id: products/🌡️ Beehive IoT sensors/todo/🌡️ Internal Temperature monitoring
title: 🌡️ Internal Temperature monitoring
description: Goal of this feature is to predict ❄️ Overwintering collapse at winter time and detect 🗃️ Poor hive ventilation at summer time by measuring temperature from inside the hive.
